name: Poltergeist Treasure
description: Poltergeist Treasure is an absurdist comedy point & click adventure game following Sir Typhil of Creulor as he attempts to escape a haunted forest.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 or higher Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTS 450+ with 1024MB+ VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Direct X 11 sound device
